publications.title: Estimation of coarse aggregate properties in concrete using hyperspectral imaging and machine learning
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Hyunho Choi
publications.abstract: This study presents a novel approach for estimating coarse aggregate properties in concrete using hyperspectral imaging combined with machine learning techniques.

publications.title: Estimation of Macroalgal Distribution in the Coastal Area of Dokdo Using Hyperspectral Imagery from a Manned Aircraft
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Jongseok Lee, Hyunho Choi, Daeseong Jung
publications.abstract: This paper presents the estimation of macroalgal distribution in the coastal area of Dokdo using hyperspectral imagery acquired from a manned aircraft.
publications.funding: Korea Institute of Civil Engineering and Building Technology

publications.title: Review on Hyperspectral Remote Sensing of Tidal Zones
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Hyunho Choi
publications.abstract: This review paper examines the applications of hyperspectral remote sensing in tidal zone monitoring and analysis.
publications.funding: Korea Institute of Ocean Science and Technology

publications.title: A Red Tide Quantification Approach for an Inexpensive Multispectral Camera Onboard an Aircraft
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Hyunho Choi
publications.journal: IEEE Transactions on Geoscience and Remote Sensing
publications.abstract: This study presents a red tide quantification approach using an inexpensive multispectral camera mounted on an aircraft.

publications.title: Evaluation of coarse aggregate properties in hardened concrete based on segment anything model (SAM)
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Hyunho Choi
publications.abstract: This research evaluates coarse aggregate properties in hardened concrete using the Segment Anything Model (SAM) for automated analysis.

publications.title: BRDF Data for Coniferous Forests Acquired from Multispectral Camera Onboard a Unmanned Aerial Vehicle
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Hyunho Choi
publications.abstract: This paper presents BRDF data for coniferous forests acquired using a multispectral camera onboard an unmanned aerial vehicle.

publications.title: De-Striping and De-Smiling of Aerial Hyperspectral Image for Water Color Analysis
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Hyunho Choi
publications.abstract: This study presents methods for de-striping and de-smiling of aerial hyperspectral images for accurate water color analysis.

publications.title: Experimental Investigations Using Computer Vision for Debris Motion Generated by Solitary Waves
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Hyunho Choi
publications.abstract: This study presents experimental investigations using computer vision techniques for analyzing debris motion generated by solitary waves.

publications.title: Analysis on the Fire Progression and Severity Variation of the Massive Forest Fire Occurred in Uljin, Korea, 2022
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Hyunho Choi
publications.abstract: This study analyzes the fire progression and severity variation of the massive forest fire that occurred in Uljin, Korea in 2022.

publications.title: Hyperspectral Remote Sensing of TiO2 Concentration in Cementitious Material Based on Machine Learning Approaches
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Hyunho Choi
publications.abstract: This research presents hyperspectral remote sensing methods for determining TiO2 concentration in cementitious materials using machine learning approaches.

publications.title: Validation of GOCI-II Products in an Inner Bay through Synchronous Usage of UAV and Ship-based Measurements
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Daeseong Jung
publications.abstract: This study validates GOCI-II products in an inner bay through synchronous usage of UAV and ship-based measurements.

publications.title: Analysis on Optical and Water Quality Measurements for Red Tide Waters
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee
publications.abstract: This paper analyzes optical and water quality measurements for red tide waters using remote sensing techniques.

publications.title: Deep Learning-based Forest Fire Classification Evaluation for Application of CAS500-4
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Hyunho Choi
publications.abstract: This study evaluates deep learning-based forest fire classification for application of CAS500-4 satellite imagery.

publications.title: Improving Precision of the Exterior Orientation and the Pixel Position of a Multispectral Camera onboard a Drone
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee
publications.journal: Journal of the Korean Society of Surveying, Geodesy, Photogrammetry and Cartography
publications.abstract: This study improves precision of exterior orientation and pixel position of multispectral cameras onboard drones through simultaneous utilization of high resolution cameras.

publications.title: Estimation of Benthic Microalgae Chlorophyll-a Concentration in Mudflat Surfaces Using Ground-based Hyperspectral Data
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Daeseong Jung
publications.abstract: This study estimates benthic microalgae chlorophyll-a concentration in mudflat surfaces using ground-based hyperspectral data.

publications.title: A Preliminary Study on Benthic Mapping of Uljin Coast Based on Airborne Hyperspectral Imagery
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Hyunho Choi
publications.abstract: This preliminary study focuses on benthic mapping of Uljin coast based on airborne hyperspectral imagery towards whitening detection.

publications.title: Planar Installation Characteristics of Crown Depth-Variable Artificial Coral Reef on Improving Coastal Resilience
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Hyunho Choi
publications.abstract: This study examines planar installation characteristics of crown depth-variable artificial coral reef on improving coastal resilience through 3D large-scale experiments.

publications.title: Calculation of correction coefficients for the RedEdge-MX multispectral camera through intercalibration
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee
publications.journal: Journal of the Korean Society of Surveying, Geodesy, Photogrammetry and Cartography
publications.abstract: This study calculates correction coefficients for the RedEdge-MX multispectral camera through intercalibration with a hyperspectral sensor.

publications.title: Improved Coastal Erosion Prevention Using a Hybrid Method with an Artificial Coral Reef
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Hyunho Choi
publications.abstract: This study presents improved coastal erosion prevention using a hybrid method with an artificial coral reef through large-scale 3D hydraulic experiments.

publications.title: Uncertainty Estimation of Single-Channel Temperature Estimation Algorithm for Atmospheric Conditions
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Moonjin Lee, Jongseok Lee, Hyunho Choi
publications.abstract: This study presents uncertainty estimation of single-channel temperature estimation algorithm for atmospheric conditions in the seas around the Korean Peninsula.
